data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Park, Eun-Ok, Shimanaga, Motohiro, Yoon, Suk Hyun, Lee, Wonchoel (2012): A new species of the genus Cerviniopsis from Sagami Bay, Japan and reinstatement of the genus Neocervinia, with a report on the male of Neocervinia itoi Lee & Yoo, 1998 (Copepoda: Harpacticoida: Aegisthidae). Zootaxa 3575: 27-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209382
